school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: not a great class, at least with this professor. strong accent and hard to understand, and he really doesnt talk about anything. response papers, midterm paper, final paper, and final. good looking old man though =)

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Bumpy ride at first, but towards the end, it was a great class. Very knowledgeable and helpful. Beware: you have to write response papers and present it in class. No final exam, just a research paper.
